EmailTemplate.name: Sales Consultant - Level 3 Quiz
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete the test for the class: {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Class__c} recently completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for completing the {!SFDC_Service_Timecard__c.Class__c} class. Our ambition is for you to take away some key elements taught during this class.
Therefore, below you will find a link to access the quiz which covers the material for this class. Once completed, your quiz will be graded and your score will be provided to you via email.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=247a3tuud0q90
Please feel free to reach out to our Virtual Training Team.
Virtual Training Team jennifer.barbosa@vinsolutions.com joi.phillips@vinsolutions.com
O: 800-980-7488
F: 913-825-6396 Support Line: Toll Free (800) 980-7488 Local (913) 825-6124 Mon-Fri 8:00am-7:00pm CST Saturday 8:00am-4:00pm CST
